body_html:
That's nice, at least we can rule out GPU.

One more thing to try (for better comparability) is to run the the_input_fn in the pure keras path. I believe it will keep at least three copies of the "features" in memory (still not enough that it should break, but it would be better to rule it out).

body:
That's nice, at least we can rule out GPU.

One more thing to try (for better comparability) is to run the the_input_fn in the pure keras path. I believe it will keep at least three copies of the "features" in memory (still not enough that it should break, but it would be better to rule it out).
